title: How to Make Steak Rub

steps.headline: Add the ground black peppercorns and paprika to a bowl.
Remove all the fat from the steak.
Place the meat in the baking pan.
Rub half of the steak rub into the steak with your fingertips for one minute.
Turn over and do the same on the other side.

methods.name: Salty paprika, pepper and garlic rub

steps.headline: Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl
Sprinkle the rub across the steak.

text: Peppercorn and paprika rub Add the ground black peppercorns and paprika to a bowl.  Mix well with spoon.  Set it aside.  Remove all the fat from the steak.  Place the meat in the baking pan.  Rub half of the steak rub into the steak with your fingertips for one minute.  Turn over and do the same on the other side.  Cook the steak as desired.  Salty paprika, pepper and garlic rub Place all of the ingredients into a mixing bowl  Mix to combine thoroughly.  Sprinkle the rub across the steak. A light layer is sufficient. Cook the steak as usual.
